Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) vehicles are considered to have broad prospects for development, and the high operating temperature of SOFC results in great potential for waste-heat recovery.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: Many concepts for utilizing waste heat of SOFC have been suggested and studied, and most of them directly couple an SOFC to a gas turbine, which require the SOFC to operate at an elevated pressure and make the system less flexible and thus harder to operate.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: In recent years, with the development of turbine and heat exchanger technology, the supercritical carbon dioxide (S-CO2) power cycle has raised widespread attractions for the waste recovery.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: This study explores the potential of S-CO2 Brayton cycle to realize waste-heat recovery for an SOFC vehicle.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: The SOFC can operate at atmospheric pressure, and the hybrid system is easier to operate than the directly coupled systems.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: In this paper, a simple recuperated S-CO2 Brayton cycle is proposed and the key component, radial inflow turbine is designed and focused.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: The flow state of the designed turbine is analyzed in detail based on computational fluid dynamics (CFD) numerical simulation.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: Five cases with different impeller tip clearances are numerically simulated to study its influence on the turbine performance.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery

Sentencas: In addition, off-design performance analysis of the radial inflow turbine is conducted considering the temperature fluctuation of SOFC in practical applications.
Titulo: Design and Analysis of S-CO2 Cycle and Radial Turbine for SOFC Vehicle Waste-Heat Recovery
